short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to save comments to Readwise as it says on the tin

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that allows you to save comments directly to Readwise.io as "tweets".

It currently supports:

* Hacker News
* Reddit (old.reddit.com only)

In order to set up the extension, you need to provide your token on the extension opens page. You can find your token at https://readwise.io/access_token.

Source code: https://github.com/marcus-crane/comments-to-readwise
